author: bridge-bot
content:
<thegaram33> question about EIP-7823: Set upper bounds for MODEXP https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-7823.md

does anyone know if there are any open discussions regarding this EIP? or is it expected to be included in Fusaka in its current form?

author: bridge-bot
content: <CarlBeek> It's scheduled for inclusion in Fusaka which means there will be a decent bias against making any changes (but still very possible). That said, if there are things that you would like to see change, please raise them ASAP. There isn't a dedicated thread on the magicians forum yet, so please go ahead and create one. I'd be happy to help put you in contact with the right people to make sure whatever concerns/changes are addressed

author: bridge-bot
content: <thegaram33> thank you! we don't have any change suggestions at this point. rather, we're considering shipping EIPs 7823, 7883, and 7951 before Fusaka. we can only do this if we believe the EIP is unlikely to change (even if it is not yet officially in final status).
